params.alchemist: The address of the alchemist to deposit wrapped ethereum into.
params.amount: The amount of ethereum to deposit.
params.minimumAmountOut: The minimum amount of yield tokens that are expected to be deposited to `recipient`.
params.recipient: The address which will receive the deposited yield tokens.
params.yieldToken: The yield token to deposit the wrapped ethereum as.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.alchemist: The address of the alchemist to refresh the allowance for.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.alchemist: The address of the alchemist to withdraw wrapped ethereum from.
params.minimumAmountOut: The minimum amount of underlying tokens that are expected to be withdrawn to `recipient`.
params.recipient: The address which will receive the ethereum.
params.shares: The amount of shares to withdraw.
params.yieldToken: The address of the yield token to withdraw.

IllegalArgument().notice: An error used to indicate that an action could not be completed because of an illegal argument was passed         to the function.

IllegalState().notice: An error used to indicate that an action could not be completed because the contract either already existed         or entered an illegal condition which is not recoverable from.

Unauthorized().notice: An error used to indicate that an action could not be completed because either the `msg.sender` or         `msg.origin` is not authorized.

depositUnderlying(address,address,uint25.notice: Takes ethereum, converts it to wrapped ethereum, and then deposits it into an alchemist. See [IAlchemistV2Actions.depositUnderlying](./alchemist/IAlchemistV2Actions.md#depositunderlying) for more details.

refreshAllowance(address).notice: Refreshes the wrapped ethereum ERC20 approval for an alchemist contract.

whitelist().notice: The address of the whitelist contract.

withdrawUnderlying(address,address,uint2.notice: Withdraws a wrapped ethereum based yield token from an alchemist, converts it to ethereum, and then         transfers it to the recipient. A withdraw approval on the alchemist is required for this call to succeed. See [IAlchemistV2Actions.withdrawUnderlying](./alchemist/IAlchemistV2Actions.md#withdrawunderlying) for more details.
